analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum na parittam dhammam paṭicca na hetu parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetu

original: naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parittam dhammam paṭicca na hetu parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca hetu mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na appamāṇam dhammam paccayā hetu appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
